thought: The Slack action (action_2) is missing required parameters, specifically the 'select', 'channelId', 'messageType', and 'text' params. This causes the workflow execution to fail. I need to set the correct params for Slack message posting, including the expression to extract the text from input_data.
plan: Set 'select' to 'channel' to send message to a channel.
Set 'channelId' mode to 'name' and value to 'general' as per user requirement.
Set 'messageType' to 'text' for simple text messages.
Set 'text' param to expression '={{$json["text"]}}' to extract text from input_data.
Test the Slack message sending with these parameters.
criticism: Current Slack action lacks required parameters and fails to execute, blocking the workflow.

tool_input.comments: Send each classification result to Slack channel #general as a message with the text extracted from input_data.
